+ # è¿è¡Œæ—¶API

+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–Avatar Scene Browserç³»ç»Ÿ

+

+ {
+     // é…ç½®å¹¶åˆå§‹åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ

+         cacheSize = 10

+     Debug.Log("Avatar Scene Browserè¿è¡Œæ—¶ç³»ç»Ÿå·²åˆå§‹åŒ–");
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ## åŒ–èº«ç®¡ç†API
+ 
+ ### åŠ è½½åŒ–èº«
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // é€šè¿‡IDåŠ è½½åŒ–èº«
+ public async Task<GameObject> LoadAvatarAsync(string avatarId)
+ {
+     // å¼‚æ­¥åŠ è½½åŒ–èº«
+     GameObject avatar = await RuntimeManager.LoadAvatarAsync(avatarId);
+     
+     if (avatar != null)
+     {
+         // é…ç½®åŒ–èº«
+         RuntimeManager.SetupAvatar(avatar);
+         return avatar;
+     }
+     
+     Debug.LogError($"æ— æ³•åŠ è½½åŒ–èº«: {avatarId}");
+     return null;
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### åŒ–èº«åˆ‡æ¢
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // åœ¨è§’è‰²ä¸Šåˆ‡æ¢åŒ–èº«
+ public void SwitchAvatar(string characterId, string newAvatarId)
+ {
+     // è·å–è§’è‰²å¼•ç”¨
+     Character character = RuntimeManager.GetCharacter(characterId);
+     
+     if (character != null)
+     {
+         // æ›´æ¢åŒ–èº«
+         RuntimeManager.SwitchAvatar(character, newAvatarId, (success) => {
+             if (success)
+                 Debug.Log("åŒ–èº«åˆ‡æ¢æˆåŠŸ");
+             else
+                 Debug.LogError("åŒ–èº«åˆ‡æ¢å¤±è´¥");
+         });
+     }
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ## åœºæ™¯ç®¡ç†API
+ 
+ ### åœºæ™¯åŠ è½½
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // åŠ è½½åœºæ™¯å¹¶æ˜¾ç¤ºè¿›åº¦
+ public async void LoadSceneWithProgress(string sceneId, Action<float> progressCallback)
+ {
+     // å¼€å§‹å¼‚æ­¥åŠ è½½
+     SceneLoadingOperation operation = RuntimeManager.LoadSceneAsync(sceneId);
+     
+     // è®¾ç½®è¿›åº¦å›è°ƒ
+     operation.OnProgressChanged += (progress) => {
+         progressCallback?.Invoke(progress);
+     };
+     
+     // ç­‰å¾…å®Œæˆ
+     await operation.Task;
+     
+     Debug.Log($"åœºæ™¯ {sceneId} åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ");
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ### åœºæ™¯å åŠ 
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // å åŠ åŠ è½½åœºæ™¯
+ public void AddSceneLayer(string sceneId)
+ {

+         if (success)
+             Debug.Log($"å åŠ åœºæ™¯ {sceneId} åŠ è½½æˆåŠŸ");
+     });
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ## äº‹ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ
+ 
+ Avatar Scene Browseræä¾›äº†ä¸°å¯Œçš„äº‹ä»¶å›è°ƒç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æ‚¨å“åº”å„ç§è¿è¡Œæ—¶äº‹ä»¶ï¼š
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ void SubscribeToEvents()
+ {
+     // è®¢é˜…åŒ–èº«åŠ è½½äº‹ä»¶
+     RuntimeManager.OnAvatarLoaded += HandleAvatarLoaded;
+     
+     // è®¢é˜…åœºæ™¯åˆ‡æ¢äº‹ä»¶
+     RuntimeManager.OnSceneChanged += HandleSceneChanged;
+     
+     // è®¢é˜…é”™è¯¯äº‹ä»¶

+ }
+ 
+ void HandleAvatarLoaded(AvatarLoadedEventArgs args)
+ {
+     Debug.Log($"åŒ–èº« {args.AvatarId} å·²åŠ è½½ï¼Œç”¨æ—¶: {args.LoadTime}ç§’");
+ }
+ 
+ void HandleSceneChanged(SceneChangedEventArgs args)
+ {
+     Debug.Log($"ä»åœºæ™¯ {args.PreviousSceneId} åˆ‡æ¢åˆ° {args.CurrentSceneId}");
+ }
+ 
+ void HandleError(ErrorEventArgs args)
+ {
+     Debug.LogError($"é”™è¯¯: {args.Message}, ç±»å‹: {args.ErrorType}");
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ ## æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–
+ 
+ è¿è¡Œæ—¶APIæä¾›äº†å¤šç§æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–é€‰é¡¹ï¼š
+ 
+ ### ç¼“å­˜ç®¡ç†
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // é…ç½®åŒ–èº«ç¼“å­˜

+ 
+ ### èµ„æºé‡Šæ”¾
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ // é‡Šæ”¾ä¸éœ€è¦çš„èµ„æº

+     // é‡Šæ”¾æœªä½¿ç”¨çš„åŒ–èº«

+ 
+ ## ç¤ºä¾‹ç”¨ä¾‹
+ 
+ ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„è¿è¡Œæ—¶ç®¡ç†å™¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š
+ 
+ ```csharp
+ using UnityEngine;
+ using System.Collections.Generic;
+ using CynthMT.AvatarSceneBrowser;
+ 
+ public class AvatarSceneManager : MonoBehaviour
+ {
+     [SerializeField] private string defaultAvatarId;
+     [SerializeField] private string defaultSceneId;

+     private void Start()
+     {
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ
+         InitializeSystem();
+         
+         // è®¢é˜…äº‹ä»¶

+         LoadDefaultContent();

+     
+     private void InitializeSystem()

+             preloadAvatars = true,

+     
+     private void SubscribeEvents()
+     {
+         RuntimeManager.OnAvatarLoaded += (args) => Debug.Log("åŒ–èº«å·²åŠ è½½");
+         RuntimeManager.OnSceneChanged += (args) => Debug.Log("åœºæ™¯å·²åˆ‡æ¢");
+     }
+     
+     private async void LoadDefaultContent()
+     {
+         // åŠ è½½é»˜è®¤åœºæ™¯

+         // åŠ è½½é»˜è®¤åŒ–èº«

+         {
+             // æ”¾ç½®åŒ–èº«åœ¨åœºæ™¯ä¸­
+             avatar.transform.position = Vector3.zero;
+         }
+     }
+     
+     private void OnDestroy()
+     {
+         // æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+         RuntimeManager.Shutdown();
+     }
+ }
+ ``` 
```

+           // ä¾§è¾¹æ å±•å¼€/æŠ˜å æ’ä»¶
+           hook.doneEach(function() {
+             const sidebarDisplayLevel = $docsify.sidebarDisplayLevel || 1;
+             // è·å–ä¾§è¾¹æ æ‰€æœ‰æ ‡é¢˜
+             const sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-nav');
+             if (sidebar) {
+               const allLis = sidebar.querySelectorAll('li');
+               for (let i = 0; i < allLis.length; i++) {
+                 const li = allLis[i];
+                 const ul = li.querySelector('ul');
+                 if (ul) {
+                   // æ·»åŠ å±•å¼€/æŠ˜å æŒ‰é’®
+                   const firstSpan = li.querySelector('span') || li.querySelector('a');
+                   if (firstSpan) {
+                     firstSpan.style.cursor = 'pointer';
+                     firstSpan.classList.add('folder-parent');
+                     
+                     // é»˜è®¤å±•å¼€æŒ‡å®šå±‚çº§
+                     const level = parseInt(firstSpan.getAttribute('data-level') || '1');
+                     if (level <= sidebarDisplayLevel) {
+                       ul.style.display = 'block';
+                       firstSpan.classList.add('open');
+                     } else {
+                       ul.style.display = 'none';
+                       firstSpan.classList.remove('open');
+                     }
+                     
+                     // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
+                     firstSpan.onclick = function(e) {
+                       if (ul.style.display === 'none') {
+                         ul.style.display = 'block';
+                         firstSpan.classList.add('open');
+                       } else {
+                         ul.style.display = 'none';
+                         firstSpan.classList.remove('open');
+                       }
+                       e.preventDefault();
+                       e.stopPropagation();
+                     };
+                   }
+                 }
+               }
+             }
+           });
          }
        ],
```
